import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete Group"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/groups/{key}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete the group of the given `key`.

You can find more information about groups [here](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/auth/groups).

**Tokens:**
- A valid [`AccessToken`](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
  with [`ADMIN`](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/auth/roles#admins) permissions is required.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"key","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Success.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"success":{"type":"boolean"}},"required":["success"],"title":"SuccessResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Invalid token.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"AccessToken does permit [`ADMIN`](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/auth/roles) access.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
